description: YouTube is a video-sharing platform with user-generated content, live streaming, and monetization opportunities, widely used for marketing, education, and entertainment

tools.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_ACTIVITIES
tools.description: Gets recent activities from a YouTube channel including video uploads, playlist additions, likes, and other channel events.

part.title: Part
part.description: Comma-separated list of activity resource properties to include (e.g., 'snippet', 'contentDetails', 'id').

channelId.title: Channel Id
channelId.description: The YouTube channel ID to retrieve activities for. Channel IDs typically start with 'UC'.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Pagination token from a previous response to get the next page of results.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of activities to return.

publishedAfter.title: Published After
publishedAfter.description: Return activities published after this date-time (RFC 3339 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

publishedBefore.title: Published Before
publishedBefore.description: Return activities published before this date-time (RFC 3339 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).

tools.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_ID_BY_HANDLE
tools.description: Retrieves the YouTube Channel ID for a specific YouTube channel handle.

channel_handle.title: Channel Handle
channel_handle.description: The YouTube channel handle (e.g., @Google) for which to retrieve the corresponding channel ID. This handle must start with an '@' symbol.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_GET_CHANNEL_STATISTICS
tools.description: Gets detailed statistics for YouTube channels including subscriber counts, view counts, and video counts.

id.title: Id
id.description: Comma-separated list of YouTube channel IDs. Channel IDs typically start with 'UC'. This is a required field and must be non-empty

part.title: Part
part.description: Comma-separated list of channel resource properties to include. Use 'statistics' for subscriber count.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_GET_VIDEO_DETAILS_BATCH
tools.description: Retrieves multiple YouTube video resource parts in a single batch call. Use when you need cohort-level metrics for many videos to reduce quota usage and latency.

hl.title: Hl
hl.description: Language for localized metadata (snippet.localized); IETF language tag, e.g., 'en'.

id.title: Id
id.description: List of YouTube video IDs to retrieve (comma-separated in request).

parts.title: Parts
parts.description: Comma-separated list of video resource properties to include. Valid parts can be one or more of: snippet, contentDetails, statistics, status, player, topicDetails, recordingDetails, fileDetails, processingDetails, suggestions, liveStreamingDetails, localizations, paidProductPlacementDetails, id.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_CAPTION_TRACK
tools.description: Retrieves a list of caption tracks for a YouTube video, returning an empty list if no captions exist or failing if the video ID is invalid or not found.

part.title: Part
part.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of one or more caption resource parts that the API response will include. Valid parts are 'id' and 'snippet'.

videoId.title: Video Id
videoId.description: The YouTube video ID for which the API should return caption tracks.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_CHANNEL_VIDEOS
tools.description: Lists videos from a specified YouTube channel, ensuring results are of `type: 'video'`.

part.title: Part
part.description: Specifies `search` resource properties to include; it must be `snippet` for this action. The `snippet` includes basic video details like ID, title, description, and thumbnails.

channelId.title: Channel Id
channelId.description: The unique ID of the YouTube channel for which videos are to be retrieved.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token for pagination; use `nextPageToken` from a previous response for the next page, or `prevPageToken` for the previous page.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: The maximum number of videos to return per page.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_PLAYLIST_ITEMS
tools.description: Tool to list videos in a playlist, with pagination support. Use when walking through a channel's uploads playlist to enumerate all videos.

part.title: Part
part.description: Comma-separated list of playlistItem resource parts to include in the response. Valid values: 'snippet', 'contentDetails', 'id', 'status'.

fields.title: Fields
fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

videoId.title: Video Id
videoId.description: Filter results to only those containing the specified video ID.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: The token for the page of results to retrieve. Obtained from a previous call's nextPageToken.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page. Must be between 0 and 50.

playlistId.title: Playlist Id
playlistId.description: The ID of the playlist for which to retrieve items. Typically a channel's uploads playlist ID.

onBehalfOfContentOwner.title: On Behalf Of Content Owner
onBehalfOfContentOwner.description: Note: For YouTube content partners. Authorize using a properly scoped account.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_USER_PLAYLISTS
tools.description: Retrieves playlists owned by the authenticated user, implicitly using mine=True.

part.title: Part
part.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of one or more playlist resource properties to include in the response. Common values are 'snippet', 'id', and 'contentDetails'.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token for pagination to retrieve a specific page of results.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of playlists to return.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LIST_USER_SUBSCRIPTIONS
tools.description: Retrieves the authenticated user's YouTube channel subscriptions, allowing specification of response parts and pagination.

part.title: Part
part.description: Specifies the comma-separated subscription resource parts to include. Valid parts are `id`, `snippet`, `contentDetails`, and `subscriberSnippet`.

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Token for a specific page of results, obtained from a previous response. Omit for the first page.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of subscription items to return per page.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_LOAD_CAPTIONS
tools.description: Downloads a specific YouTube caption track, which must be owned by the authenticated user, and returns its content as text. Note: This action requires you to own the video (YouTube Data API v3 restriction). Non-owned videos will return 403 Forbidden errors, including many auto-generated caption tracks.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique YouTube-assigned ID of the caption track to download.

tfmt.title: Tfmt
tfmt.description: Desired format for the caption track. Supported formats: 'srt' (SubRip), 'sbv' (SubViewer), 'vtt' (WebVTT).

tools.name: YOUTUBE_SEARCH_YOU_TUBE
tools.description: Searches YouTube for videos, channels, or playlists using a query term, returning the raw API response.

q.title: Q
q.description: Search query term. Supports: - Basic text: 'machine learning' - Exact phrases: '"exact phrase"' - Exclusions: 'python -snake' - Multiple terms: 'AI OR ML' - Channel search: '@channelhandle' or channel name

part.title: Part
part.description: Comma-separated list of search resource properties (e.g., 'id', 'snippet') to include in the API response.

type.title: Type
type.description: Restricts search to 'video', 'channel', or 'playlist'; comma-separate for multiple types (e.g., 'video,channel').

pageToken.title: Page Token
pageToken.description: Pagination token from a previous response's 'nextPageToken' or 'prevPageToken', used to retrieve a specific page of results.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of items to return per page.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_SUBSCRIBE_CHANNEL
tools.description: Subscribes the authenticated user to a specified YouTube channel, identified by its unique `channelId` which must be valid and existing.

channelId.title: Channel Id
channelId.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the YouTube channel to subscribe to (typically starts with 'UC').

tools.name: YOUTUBE_UPDATE_THUMBNAIL
tools.description: Sets the custom thumbnail for a YouTube video using an image from thumbnailUrl; the authenticated user must have permission to edit the video.

videoId.title: Video Id
videoId.description: Identifier of the YouTube video for which to update the thumbnail.

thumbnailUrl.title: Thumbnail Url
thumbnailUrl.description: Publicly accessible URL of the new thumbnail image. Must be JPG, GIF, or PNG; under 2MB. Recommended: 16:9 aspect ratio, 1280x720 resolution (minimum 640px width).

tools.name: YOUTUBE_UPDATE_VIDEO
tools.description: Updates metadata for a YouTube video identified by videoId, which must exist; an empty list for tags removes all existing tags.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: New tags, replacing all existing. An empty list removes all. No change if omitted or `None`.

title.title: Title
title.description: New video title. No change if omitted or `None`.

videoId.title: Video Id
videoId.description: The video's unique YouTube ID, typically found in its URL.

categoryId.title: Category Id
categoryId.description: New YouTube category ID. No change if omitted or `None`.

description.title: Description
examples: This is an updated description of my awesome video.
description.description: New video description. No change if omitted or `None`.

privacyStatus.title: Privacy Status
privacyStatus.description: New privacy status ('public', 'private', or 'unlisted'). No change if omitted or `None`.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_UPLOAD_VIDEO
tools.description: Uploads a video from a local file path to a YouTube channel; the video file must be in a YouTube-supported format.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: List of keyword tags (strings) for the video, used to improve discoverability.

categoryId.title: Category Id
categoryId.description: YouTube category ID (e.g., '22' for People & Blogs). See YouTube Data API docs for a full list of category IDs.

description.title: Description
examples: A detailed walkthrough of my latest project, showcasing all its features.
description.description: Detailed description of the video content, optionally including keywords and context.

privacyStatus.title: Privacy Status
privacyStatus.description: Privacy status: 'public', 'private' (uploader/specified users only), or 'unlisted' (link accessible, not publicly listed).

videoFilePath.title: FileUploadable
videoFilePath.description: Video file to upload. Provide a FileUploadable object with valid s3key, mimetype, and name.

tools.name: YOUTUBE_VIDEO_DETAILS
tools.description: Retrieves specified information parts (e.g., snippet, contentDetails, statistics) for a YouTube video, identified by its ID.

id.title: Id
id.description: The YouTube video ID (typically an 11-character string) for which details are to be retrieved.

part.title: Part
part.description: Comma-separated list of video resource parts that the API response will include. Valid parts: 'snippet' (title, description, thumbnails), 'contentDetails' (duration, definition, dimension), 'statistics' (view count, like count, comment count), 'status' (upload status, privacy status), 'player' (embed HTML), 'topicDetails' (associated topics), 'recordingDetails' (recording location and date), 'liveStreamingDetails' (live broadcast details), and 'localizations' (localized metadata).
